commit.message:
re PR c++/25337 (ICE with template processing)

	PR c++/25337 
	* pt.c (tsubst_copy_and_build): Permit dependent types for the
	object in a class member access expression.
	PR c++/25337
	* g++.dg/template/defarg7.C: New test.

From-SVN: r108394
